userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) are held by the Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu, (212) 998-2630.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Project files from the Wagner oral history project OH.001. The accession number associated with this collection is 1979.009.
